BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTIA_HST_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO,STR_OBSERVATION,STR_REPLY_DESCRIP,NUM_SUBMIT_TO,STR_REPLY_STATUS,DT_REPLY_RECV_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,STR_FINAL_ACTION_DET,STR_FORWARDED_DET,NUM_SL_NO,STR_PARA_DETAILS,DT_PROPOSED_PARA_DATE,NO_OF_TIMES_PROPOSED)(select T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO,T.STR_OBSERVATION,T.STR_REPLY_DESCRIP,T.NUM_SUBMIT_TO,T.STR_REPLY_STATUS,T.DT_REPLY_RECV_DATE,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.STR_FINAL_ACTION_DET,T.STR_FORWARDED_DET,T.NUM_SL_NO,T.STR_PARA_DETAILS,T.DT_PROPOSED_PARA_DATE,(select nvl(max(A.NO_OF_TIMES_PROPOSED),0)+1 from ACTIA_HST_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL A where A.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) from ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL T where T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)

INSERT INTO ACTIA_HST_AUDIT_TRACK_TRN(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,STR_AUDIT_START_YEAR,STR_AUDIT_END_YEAR,NUM_DEPT_CODE,DT_AUDTING_FROM_DATE,DT_AUDTING_TO_DATE,STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO,GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,STR_STATUS,STR_ACTION_TAKEN_BY,STR_REPLY_SUBMIT_BY,NO_OF_TIMES_PROPOSED)(select T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_AUDIT_START_YEAR,T.STR_AUDIT_END_YEAR,T.NUM_DEPT_CODE,T.DT_AUDTING_FROM_DATE,T.DT_AUDTING_TO_DATE,T.STR_AUDIT_BODY_CODE,T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO,T.GSTR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.STR_STATUS,T.STR_ACTION_TAKEN_BY,T.STR_REPLY_SUBMIT_BY,(select nvl(max(A.NO_OF_TIMES_PROPOSED),0)+1 from ACTIA_HST_AUDIT_TRACK_TRN A where A.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE)from ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_TRN T where T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?)
DELETE FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_TRN T where T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL T where T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=? and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL A (a.gnum_hospital_code, a.str_audit_body_code,a.num_audit_track_slno, a.str_para_details, a.str_observation,a.str_reply_descrip,a.str_reply_status, a.dt_reply_recv_date,a.gnum_isvalid, a.gnum_seat_id, a.gdt_entry_date,a.gdt_lstmod_date, a.gnum_lstmod_seatid, a.str_final_action_det,a.num_sl_no,a.DT_PROPOSED_PARA_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update ACTIA_AUDIT_REPLY_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_REP_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PROPOSED_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_PROPOSED_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_SCH_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.num_audit_sch_slno=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PARATRACK_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_PARATRACK_SLNO=?
DELETE FROM ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL T WHERE T.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=? and t.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_DTL A (a.gnum_hospital_code, a.str_audit_body_code,a.num_audit_track_slno, a.str_observation,a.str_reply_descrip,a.str_reply_status, a.dt_reply_recv_date,a.gnum_isvalid, a.gnum_seat_id, a.gdt_entry_date,a.gdt_lstmod_date, a.gnum_lstmod_seatid, a.str_final_action_det,a.num_sl_no,a.str_para_details,a.DT_PROPOSED_PARA_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update ACTIA_AUDIT_TRACK_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_TRACK_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_REPLY_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_REP_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_PROPOSED_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.NUM_AUDIT_PROPOSED_SLNO=?
update ACTIA_AUDIT_BODY_SCH_TRN t set t.str_status=? where t.num_audit_sch_slno=?
